job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.jobDuties: Design and implement scalable backend services using Go and PostgreSQL. Collaborate with product teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

skills.targetDescription: Design and implement scalable backend services using Go and PostgreSQL. Collaborate with product teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

skill.name: Go Programming Language
skill.description: Proficiency in Go (Golang) programming language for building scalable, concurrent backend services and microservices architectures.

proficiencyLevel.name: Advanced
proficiencyLevel.description: Applies Go independently in complex contexts, designing scalable architectures and implementing advanced patterns. Can mentor others and lead technical decisions.

skill.name: PostgreSQL
skill.description: Expertise in PostgreSQL database design, query optimization, performance tuning, and advanced features including JSON operations and full-text search.

proficiencyLevel.name: Intermediate
proficiencyLevel.description: Performs PostgreSQL database operations with routine independence, including schema design, query optimization, and basic performance tuning.

skill.name: Amazon Web Services
skill.description: Working knowledge of AWS cloud services including EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, and other core infrastructure services for deploying and managing cloud-based applications.

proficiencyLevel.name: Novice
proficiencyLevel.description: Basic working knowledge of AWS services with ability to deploy and maintain applications using common services with guidance from documentation and senior team members.
